lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japan wanted the Paris communique to imply a higher value for the dollar, perhaps by substituting the word "recent" for "current," while the United States wanted it to more clearly point to the dollar's weaker levels now, perhaps by use of the word "present," they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: More and more companies have announced plans to move production facilities offshore to take advantage of cheaper costs abroad, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At a meeting this week in Paris, senior government officials from major nations are considering an Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) staff report that forecasts a continuing large Japanese trade surplus, they said.
